name: Project 47
description:
Awaken in a place forgotten by time, you will find nothing in your path but a variety of insects that will not hesitate to destroy you. During your journey you will find multiple abandoned structures, a reflection of the mysterious disappearance of the society that lived there.

You will control a curious android, your body is weak and your magnetic hands and feet don't give you much security against the dangers that lurk around you, so be careful. To discover the secrets of this universe, as well as understand your own existence, you will need to cross this unique world, seek answers to your questions and understand more about your past.

Features and Mechanics:


  • Face a variety of insects and other dangers to challenge your skills and reflexes;
  • Be amazed by a unique Pixel Art style, with animations and scenes made one by one;
  • Cross five distinct biomes, each with its own fauna, flora and various abandoned structures;
  • Find new skills to help you on your journey and discover your destiny;
  • Uncover the history and other events of this universe through old notes, in addition to observing the environment and even the architecture of the world;
  • Enjoy more than 140 sound effects, as well as 14 original songs, to give the player depth and immersion;
  • Reach the game's 23 achievements, including story moments, collectibles and other hidden secrets;
  • Discover mechanics and threats specific to each biome: Use elevators in the forest, swim through aquatic ruins, protect yourself from the scorching desert sun, guide yourself through the darkness of the caves.... Each new scenario will give you new challenges, possibilities and enemies;
